title: PrivacyBench: A Conversational Benchmark for Evaluating Privacy in Personalized AI
summary: Personalized AI agents rely on access to a user's digital footprint, which often includes sensitive data from private emails, chats and purchase histories. Yet this access creates a fundamental societal and privacy risk: systems lacking social-context awareness can unintentionally expose user secrets, threatening digital well-being.
